top.title: 'Mandate for change': Zohran Mamdani wins New York City mayoral election
top.summary: It is a historic moment as Mamdani also becomes the first South Asian and first Muslim to lead the city.

top.title: Mamdani seals remarkable victory - but real challenges await
top.summary: After entering the race largely unnoticed, the new mayor of New York City can expect to face serious scrutiny in office.

top.title: At least seven people killed after UPS cargo plane crashes in Kentucky
top.summary: Eleven others were injured when the plane exploded during takeoff near  Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport.

top.title: Shein opens first store in Paris overshadowed by French sex-doll inquiry
top.summary: Shein's fast-fashion outlet inside Paris department store BHV prompts several French brands to leave.

top.title: Tesla says Musk should be paid $1tn - will shareholders agree?
top.summary: The car-maker is lobbying fiercely for the pay package, which is being voted on ahead of its AGM on Thursday.

top.title: AI 'godmother' Fei-Fei Li says she is 'proud to be different'
top.summary: AI pioneer Professor Fei-Fei Li is set to receive a top engineering prize from the King for her contributions to the field.

title.#text: Zohran Mamdani won because he knew when to be online — and when not to
We finally have a Nintendo Store app for iOS and Android
